faqs.question: What is WCC?
faqs.answer: Women Coding Community is a global community of women in tech...

faqs.question: How do I join WCC?
faqs.answer: Visit our website and sign up for free...

faqs.question: When are the sessions?
faqs.answer: Sessions are held every other Wednesday at 7 PM EST...

faqs.question: Can I volunteer?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We're always looking for volunteers...
